head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ROSENBERG, LOUISE MARIE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ROSENBERG, LOUISE MARIE

block.p: ROSENBERG-Louise Marie, 63. Died peacefully Tuesday in her Wilton home, surrounded by family. With husband Peter, she transformed their business Vallin Galleries into a renowned Asian art gallery. Louise was an inspirational, nurturing mother and friend. She created a loving family & gracious home with beautiful gardens. She is survived by her husband, six children Robert, Jean, Michael, Thomas, Simon and Nicolas, five grandchildren, and sister Mary.
ROSENBERG-Louise. Devoted wife, mother, grandmother, dear friend. Great spirit, brave to the end. Live forever in our hearts. Seymour and Linda Hacker
